title: Looking To Snap Downtrend, Can Amazon Deliver Results in Q1?
text: It's been a red year for tech. However, it's been an even tougher stretch for Amazon shares.

title: Stock Market Today: Microsoft Delivers, Alphabet Disappoints in Flat Day for Stocks
text: The major indexes managed to mostly stop the bleeding after yesterday's rout, but they didn't gain much ground, either, amid mixed earnings reports from a range of blue-chip stocks. Microsoft (MSFT, +4.8%) shares were jolted higher Wednesday following the software maker's stellar quarterly report last night.

title: The Ratings Game: Microsoft stock heads toward best day in two years as earnings show ‘absolute resolute confidence'
text: Microsoft Corp.'s steady outperformance in an earnings report again won near-universal praise from analysts Wednesday, helping send Microsoft's stock toward its biggest daily gain in more than two years.

title: Activision And Microsoft: What's Behind The Greatest Deal In Video Game History?
text: In an investing world that has been ravaged by ongoing conflicts, wrecked supply chains, rising inflation, and upcoming rate hikes, generating positive market returns becomes increasingly difficult. In such as world, Microsoft's $70 billion acquisition of Activision presents investors with an interesting merger arbitrage opportunity with a 23% upside given today's prices.

title: Tech Stocks Are Key to Win Big in the Bear Market
text: Buying tech stocks as soon as they enter a bear market is key to win big. Over the past few decades, every time the Nasdaq reached that territory, it bounced back quickly and with vigor.

title: Microsoft's (MSFT) Q3 Earnings & Revenues Surpass Estimates
text: Microsoft's (MSFT) third-quarter fiscal 2022 results reflect continued strength in the Azure cloud platform and LinkedIn revenues.

text: The tech giant beat expectations in its latest quarter.

title: Cloud Drives Microsoft Fiscal Q3 Earnings: ETFs to Buy
text: Microsoft continued a long track of beating earnings estimates and topped the revenue estimate driven by strong growth in its Azure platform in the booming cloud computing space.

title: Options Traders, Analysts Respond to Microsoft's Earnings
text: Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) is surging today, last seen up 5.5% to trade at $285.38, following the tech name's  top- and bottom-line wins  for the third-quarter.

title: Microsoft: Rebounding After Strong Q3 FY22 Results But Still Cheap
text: MSFT shares are up 5.4% pre-market after strong results overnight, but remain 19% below their December peak and at 31.9x CY21 EPS. Revenues and EBIT grew by more than 20% on a currency-neutral basis, led by strong double-digit growth in two of the three segments.

title: The Divergence Is Here
text: Ever since the Treasury yield curve inverted a few weeks back, everyone's talking about a recession. The post The Divergence Is Here appeared first on InvestorPlace.

title: Microsoft stock rallies after fiscal third-quarter results exceed expectations and upbeat forecast bucks economic gloom
text: Microsoft sees tech spending staying strong even if the economy slows, as software that boosts productivity remains in demand to offset inflation.

title: Microsoft Earnings: Inflation-Proof Business Model - Buy On Weakness
text: Microsoft reported a robust double beat on its FQ3'22 earnings card. Azure led its impressive performance again, as growth was broad-based.

title: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) Saves The Day, For Now
text: With the major indices being slammed right down towards their lows of the year this week, there was a lot riding on Microsoft's (NASDAQ: MSFT) earnings last night.

title: Microsoft Rises, Alphabet Falls Because 'Not All Technology Stocks Are Created Equal'
text: Microsoft gets a boost from better-than-expected guidance for its fiscal fourth quarter, and strong demand for its cloud services.

title: Why Microsoft Shares Are Moving Higher Today
text: Microsoft Corp (NASDAQ: MSFT) shares are trading higher Wednesday after the company reported better-than-expected financial results and issued guidance above analyst estimates.  Microsoft said fiscal third-quarter revenue increased 18% year-over-year to $49.4 billion, which beat the $49.03.

title: Visa, Microsoft stock gain would add more than 140 points to the Dow's price
text: Shares of Visa Inc. V, -4.22% surged 5.9% and Microsoft Corp.'s stock MSFT, -3.74% rallied 3.5% to pace the Dow Jones Industrial Average's DJIA, -2.38% premarket gainers Wednesday, in the wake of the companies' better-than-expected quarterly results. The stocks' price gains were adding a combined 141 points to the Dow's price, which accounts for more than half of the Dow futures' YM00, +0.61% gains of 234 points, or 0.7%.

title: Futures rebound from tech selloff as Microsoft, Visa gain
text: U.S. stock index futures jumped on Wednesday on strong earnings updates from Microsoft and Visa, following a brutal selloff in the previous session that sent the tech-heavy Nasdaq to its lowest close since December 2020.

title: Microsoft reassurance 'for the ages' calms Wall Street nerves after tech bloodletting
text: After dramatic Nasdaq blood-letting overnight, the reassuring statement from Microsoft Corporation (NASDAQ:MSFT) on continued demand for cloud computing services, "will be heard around the world" and calm Wall Street nerves, according to one impressed analyst. Revenue for the tech titan's third quarter was reported at US$49.4bn, up 21% on a year ago, with sales from the Intelligent Cloud arm jumping 26% to US$19.1bn.

title: Microsoft flexes its earnings muscle on cloud growth as MSFT stock rises 5% after hours
text: Microsoft (NASDAQ: MSFT) provided tech investors with much-needed respite by reporting better than expected results for its fiscal third quarter.

title: Cloud computing helps power strong Microsoft quarter
text: Microsoft on Tuesday reported strong quarterly earnings, powered by demand for cloud computing.

title: Microsoft Stock Rises on Cloud Growth, Alphabet Tumbles on a YouTube Miss
text: Software maker Microsoft gets a boost from better-than-expected guidance for its fiscal fourth quarter, and strong demand for its cloud services.

title: Market Snapshot: U.S. stock futures hint at rebound for Wall Street, with Microsoft, Alphabet earnings in focus
text: U.S. stock futures were pointing to gains for Wall Street on Wednesday, with tech in focus following mixed results from Microsoft Corp. and Alphabet Inc. and the worst day for the Nasdaq Composite since 2020.
